metadata.name: Monumental Genesis #1/3
metadata.description:
Welcome to Monumental, the leading NFT platform that empowers art galleries, artist collectives, and charities to showcase and sell their artists' work like never before.

Our cutting-edge platform equips participants in the web 3.0 era with powerful tools to curate and promote their own selection of artists and artworks. With Monumental, you can take advantage of the latest technology to showcase your artists' work online and reach a global audience.

Today, on March 13th, 2023, we are thrilled to announce the launch of our highly anticipated first genesis edition, featuring a limited release of only three tokens. This exclusive collection is a testament to the innovation and creativity that Monumental stands for. Get ready to experience the future of art sales and distribution with Monumental.
